message.body: Aren't relationships interesting and a pain in the ass In your perfect world babies interesting work plenty of time for all and enough funding Oh and an ongoing relationship ?
hahahah. Lee. I have never been married. not quite a pain in the ass yet. but yes perfect world would include: babies, no resumes, and work all the time.
Lee - just curious. when/where do you want to meet again. re laser?
Did you have time tomorrow. I can pick you up at trader joes at 9:30
Yes - you are always in my schedule!
Hi Can 'to do that Fred liana just emailed me and I didn't catch on my calendar that I am doing something at 10 Going to Ctown Around 3:30 we could do it there as an option
